short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quotes from Imam Ali's Nahj al-Balagha

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With every new Chrome tab, this extension will display current time and a new quote from Nahj al-Balagha and other books associated with the Masomeen (a.s). 

I will be adding quotes from more resources every month. If you would like to find out more, help with collecting quotes, or support the project, please feel free to email me through my website or leave a comment here. 

All constructive feedback would be much appreciated. 

Iltimas e dua.  

++++++++

Aug 9 , 2021

• Muharram 2021 starts
• Disabled background images to observe mourning
• Added one background wallpaper. 

++++++++

May 15, 2021

• Eid Mubarak! 
• We refined our Pexels image API search but we have not managed to get our API built to help with the images. 
• We are still looking for help with the project. If you know someone who can help build an image API, please connect them to us! 

++++++++

Apr 12, 2021

• There was an unannounced API change by Pexels which bypassed our filters. That caused the extension to show images that we had not approved. This new update is a static image and we are now working to produce our own API to ensure this never happens again. If yo would like to submit images, please do reach out to us salamummahtab@gmail.com


++++++++

• Removed hover display
• Added more quotes
• Added Google Chrome extension icons
